page.title: 06Express Dairies: Yeovil.
page.content: {Local farming produces a lot of milk. It is split into two parts,covering Devonshire and Wessex. The dairy in Exeter produces bottles for the Devonshire area and cartons for the entire region. The dairy at Sherborne produces bottles for Wessex and poly bottles for the whole region. The dairy collects milk from within 12 miles of itself. It keeps its 130 floats at Blandford, Bridgwater, Chard, Crewkerne, Frome, Sherborne, Somerton, Taunton and Yeovil. They have 300 employees, 60 women and 240 men.{They deliver to 61,000 houses. The owners of the dairy are Express Dairies U.K. Ltd.They have approximately 500,000 milk bottles in the Wessex area. They have no tankers because the Milk Marketing Board collects all the milk from the farms. {They deliver to S.W. of England.
